name: Two Slices of Love
summary:
One night you get a call, your hot girlfriend has just decided to move into your apartment.
That sounds great! But she's not coming alone, her younger sister is coming with her.
Now you have the chance to live with not just one beautiful girl, but two!
But not everything is going to be so simple.
Sister rivalry is growing day by day and you have no idea why.
Each of the girls keeps her own secrets.
As their advances become more aggressive and their desires more uncontrollable,
it's up to you to restore peace to your home, control your feelings and order pizza for dinner.​
